column2: Oh, I love this one! The Passage is also part of the Terminal 2 Network, and you can launch it through this mission, the Pathways or the Desktop.
I think this game might have been made by a friend of Ada's. The main character looks a lot like her, and it doesn't hurt that I totally dig her style, too.

Uh-oh! I'm detecting that `The Passage` isn't installed!

You need to download it from the App Center if you want to play.

Click the icon named `More Apps` on the Desktop, then search for the program you want to install.
